name: International Conference on Advances in Communication Technology, Computing and Engineering
content: The International Conference on Advances in Communication Technology, Computing and Engineering will be organized from 24 to 26 March 2021 in Morocco hosted by ArtyAds Group. The conference is organized with the objective of bringing together innovative scientists, professors, research scholars, students and industrial experts in the field of Computing, Communication and Engineering to a common forum. ICACTCE'21 is offering a fantastic opportunity to attend a global scientific forum from the convenience of your desktop. No traveling, no hotel expenses, no time away from the office. The conference runs fully online, from paper submission, including reviewing, conference discussion, and post-conference processing. The online conference is a smart and affordable manner of presenting research results. Due to COVID-19, this edition is organized virtually and the participation is totally Free of Charge.
